message: Hey Ladies of Cru: Registration for the Women's Retreat is now open! Please don't hesitate to contact me with any questions or concerns about cost/transportation/anything via Facebook or at 612.812.9041. It's going to be a sweet overnight and I hope to see you all there! https://www.eventregistrationtool.com/#/register/8ba8cda5-ab7f-4068-807f-8ad019e6ca26/page/
